total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the location of the two different numbers in the first row of the input grid.
Q2: Determine the larger number and the smaller number between the two identified numbers.
Q3: Draw a vertical line down from the larger number until it reaches the same row as the smaller number.
Q4: Draw a horizontal line from the end of the vertical line to the smaller number.
Q5: Fill the inside of the rectangle formed by the lines with the smaller number.
Q6: Identify the location of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q7: Draw a vertical line up from the number 1 until it reaches the same row as the smaller number.
Q8: Draw a horizontal line from the end of the vertical line to the smaller number.
Q9: Fill the inside of the rectangle formed by the lines with the smaller number.
Q10: The remaining cells should be filled with 0.
